package.name: robot_description
package.description: The 'robot_description' package provides a comprehensive model of our custom robot, essential for simulation and visualization in ROS2 environments. It includes a detailed URDF (Unified Robot Description Format) file that specifies the robot's physical structure, joint configurations, and kinematic properties. Accompanying this URDF are Collada (.dae) format meshes derived from CAD files, offering a realistic visual representation of the robot. Additionally, this package encompasses RViz configuration files for effective visualization and debugging, alongside launch files for easy integration and testing within ROS2 frameworks. This package is pivotal for the robot's simulation and serves as a foundation for further development in autonomous navigation and SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping).
